title: Video Editor
job_overview:
Location: Remote (Work-from-Home)

 About the Role
We are looking for a skilled and reliable Video Editor to join our creative team. You will be responsible for editing high-quality video content, contributing to visual storytelling, and delivering projects that align with our brand standards and timelines.

Qualifications & Requirements
preferably with  3–5 years of professional experience in video editing.
Also Experience working from home or in a fully remote setup is highly preferred.
Proficiency in video editing tools such as Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects, Final Cut Pro, or DaVinci Resolve.
Strong sense of visual storytelling, pacing, audio syncing, and color grading.
Excellent organizational skills to manage multiple projects with tight deadlines.
